Package scene

Class SceneElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • scene.SceneElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Canvas, Geometry, Point

    public abstract class SceneElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the operations necessary to place the item on a scenegraph. The scenegraph itself starts with the root scene element and further elements

    • Method Detail

      • addChildElement

        public void addChildElement(SceneElement elem)

      • setParent

        public void setParent(SceneElement elem)

      • translate

        public void translate(float x,
                      float y)
        Moves the current scene element relative to its parent. Effects all children elements.
        Parameters:
        x - amount to move in x direction
        y - amount to move in y direction

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float radians)
        Rotates the current scene element relative to its parent, effects all children elements in the graph.
        Parameters:
        radians - amount to rotate by (counter clockwise)

      • scale

        public void scale(float xScale,
                  float yScale)
        Scales the current scene element relative to it's parent, effects all children.
        Parameters:
        xScale - amount to scale in the x dimension
        yScale - amount to scale in the y dimension

      • scale

        public void scale(float s)
        Scales the current scene element relative to it's parent, effects all children.
        Parameters:
        s - the amount to scale the whole element in both dimensions

      • getGlobalCoordinate

        public Point getGlobalCoordinate()
        Returns:
        the x and y coordinates relative to the while scene graph
